casebody.data:
First Department,

Mat, 1955.*

(May 25, 1955.) Della M. Grattan et al., Doing Business as D. M. Grattan Co., Respondents, v. Societa Per Azzioni Cotonificio Cantoni, Appellant, et al., Defendant.

Not published with other decision of May 25, 1955, 285 App. Div. 1143. — [Rep.

Concur — Peck, P. J., Cohn, Bastow, Botein and Rabin, JJ.
